content: between the square brackets for the indicated number of times __ = stitch count at the end of the row/round ©2022 chibiscraft // febby pranajaya - all right reserved c roc he t pat t e rn by fe b by p ranaj aya @c hibisc raf t 2 head and body ears make 2 start with black yarn start with white yarn to make the head make 6hdc in a magic_ring then tighten the magic_ring do not r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 join fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing r2 6inc 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 r4 single_crochet increase single_crochet x6 24 r5 3sc increase x6 30 r6-9 4 rounds 30sc 30 r10 14sc increase x2 32 r11 32sc 32 r12 2sc decrease x8 24 r13 single_crochet decrease x8 16 start stuffing the head with fiberfill r14 8dec 8 arms hugging continue to make the body change to black r15 flo single_crochet increase x4 12 start with black yarn r16 single_crochet increase x6 18 make 22ch start from the third loop from the r17 18sc 18 hook work 8hdc single_crochet 2sl st single_crochet 8hdc 20 change to white fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing r18 2sc increase x6 24 r19-20 2 rounds 24sc 24 r21 single_crochet decrease x8 16 start stuffing the body with fiberfill r22 8dec 8 fasten_off and leave a long tail to complete using a tapestry needle pass the tail through all fl of the notes last round and pull make a knot and hide the yarn - you can adjust the length of the arms by inside the body adjusting the number of chains and half_double_crochet - if you want regular arms not the hugging one you can make them using the same instruction as the legs legs make 2 start with black yarn make 7ch start from the third loop from the hook work 3dc half_double_crochet single_crochet 5 fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing ©2022 chibiscraft // febby pranajaya - all right reserved c roc he t pat t e rn by fe b by p ranaj aya @c hibisc raf t 3 eyes make 2 start with black yarn make 6sc in magic_ring tighten the magic_ring make 2ch then single_crochet at the second loop from the hook join to the first st with a slip_stitch fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing do the invisible finish assembly - attach the ears to the head between r4-5 - attach the eyes between r7-10 4st apart - embroider the eyes with white yarn - attach the arms between r16-17 congratulations your little panda amigurumi is - attach the legs on r20 of the body ready it will be my big pleasure to see your - embroider the nose with dark brown yarn at finished toy with hashtag #chibiscraftpattern or r10 add a ravelry project -
